title: Can't type in Champion Select?
body:
Heya! Have played a few ranked games since Patch 6.9 and since the patch was entered I cannot type anything in Champ Select. Well, I can type, and hit enter, but then it doesn't show up and no one can see it. Also, the word 'null' is there next to my name like a clan tag sorta thing. I can still talk in chat, and in game, but just in champ select.

At first I thought I was chat restricted, but for what, I do not know, and of course, I received no notification. I can only assume this is a bug. Can someone explain to me please? : )

replies.body:
Hey The Spawn Man,

Can you try this solution and let me know if the problem persists?

> [{quoted}](name=Pogba2k,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G0wtwOpQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-04T22:44:45.787+0000)
>
> Go to View club/chat, and tick off the &quot;Show club tags&quot; and null will go away and you will be able to chat.
> Temporary fix until its fixed.

Thanks!
Nah it seemed to work when I joined a club with a clan tag.
